com.emc.vipr.client.core

Interface TopLevelResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the resource type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthnProviders, AutoTieringPolicies, BlockMigrations, BlockVirtualPools, FileVirtualPools, Networks, NetworkSystems, ProtectionSystems, StoragePools, StoragePorts, StorageProviders, StorageSystems, StorageTiers, VirtualArrays, VirtualDataCenters

    public interface TopLevelResources<T extends DataObjectRestRep>
    Interface for resources that are considered top-level (independent of other types).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<T> getAll()
      Gets all resources for this resource type.
      java.util.List<T> getAll(ResourceFilter<T> filter)
      Gets all resources for this resource type.
      java.util.List<? extends NamedRelatedResourceRep> list()
      Lists named resources (name + ID) for this resource type.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        java.util.List<? extends NamedRelatedResourceRep> list()

        Lists named resources (name + ID) for this resource type.

        API Call: GET /RESOURCE_PATH

        Returns:
        the named resources.

      • getAll

        java.util.List<T> getAll()

        Gets all resources for this resource type. This is combination of the list() call combined with a bulk query to retrieve the resources.

        API Call: GET /RESOURCE_PATH

        Returns:
        All resources of this type available to the user.
        See Also:
        list(), Resources.getByRefs(java.util.Collection)

      • getAll

        java.util.List<T> getAll(ResourceFilter<T> filter)

        Gets all resources for this resource type. This is combination of the list() call combined with a bulk query to retrieve the resources. This optionally filters the results by the filter specified.

        API Call: GET /RESOURCE_PATH

        Parameters:
        filter - the resource filter to apply to the results as they are returned (optional).
        Returns:
        Filtered list of resources of this type available to the user.
        See Also:
        list(), Resources.getByRefs(java.util.Collection, ResourceFilter)
